name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue
name_original: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue
description:
Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue is the second title in the Ty the Tasmanian Tiger series, released for the PlayStation 2, Xbox, GameCube, Microsoft Windows and Game Boy Advance. It was developed by Krome Studios and published by EA Games, released in North America on October 12, 2004 and later released in PAL regions on November 5, 2004. The game was followed by Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 3: Night of the Quinkan in 2005.
A port for Microsoft Windows was digitally released via Steam on December 13, 2017.
